plot: Tim Walker has rounded up horses for delivery to the Army and needs to drive them through Shotgun pass. The Mitchell brothers are also in the horse business and they have blocked the pass in an attempt to stop him.
title: Shotgun Pass
plot_es: Tim Walker has rounded up horses for delivery to the Army and needs to drive them through Shotgun pass. The Mitchell brothers are also in the horse business and they have blocked the pass in an attempt to stop him.
plot_en: Tim Walker has rounded up horses for delivery to the Army and needs to drive them through Shotgun pass. The Mitchell brothers are also in the horse business and they have blocked the pass in an attempt to stop him.
